content: Can you provide a HTML and CSS code for a shoe e-commerce website? The website should have a homepage with a featured section for new arrivals, a search bar, and categories for different types of shoes. There should also be a product page with detailed information on each shoe, including multiple images and pricing options. Additionally, there should be a shopping cart and checkout page for customers to complete their purchases. Please include any necessary JavaScript for interactive elements, such as a sliding image gallery on the product page.
